context: Large Asian agricultural cooperative evaluating ¥1B investment in carbon credit trading platform to monetize sustainable farming practices

request.purpose: Develop carbon credit trading platform, implement measurement systems, and establish verification processes for 500,000 hectares of farmland
request.justification: Capitalize on growing carbon market, enhance farmer income through sustainable practices, meet national carbon reduction targets

decision_process.outcome: Identified 2 million tons annual carbon sequestration potential, ¥500M annual market opportunity
Selected blockchain-based platform, designed farmer-friendly mobile interface, established partnerships with 3 international carbon exchanges
Successfully traded ¥50M in carbon credits, achieved 95% farmer participation rate
5-year scaling plan targeting ¥2B annual carbon credit trading volume

business_impact.expected_outcome: ¥300M annual revenue from carbon trading, enhanced farmer income through premium pricing, improved environmental outcomes, strengthened cooperative position
business_impact.projected_value: ¥3,000,000,000 in cumulative carbon credit sales over 10 years

lessons_learned: Farmer education and training critical for adoption, robust measurement systems essential for credibility, diversified market linkages reduce price risk, integrated approach combining technology and community engagement maximizes success
